title: Google\Cloud\Dataform\V1beta1\CompilationResultAction\Relation
name: Relation
description:
Represents a database relation.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dataform.v1beta1.CompilationResultAction.Relation

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

methods.name: __construct
methods.description: Constructor.

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.dependency_targets
params.description: A list of actions that this action depends on.

params.name: data.disabled
params.description: Whether this action is disabled (i.e. should not be run).

params.name: data.tags
params.description: Arbitrary, user-defined tags on this action.

params.name: data.relation_descriptor
params.description: Descriptor for the relation and its columns.

params.name: data.relation_type
params.description: The type of this relation.

params.name: data.select_query
params.description: The SELECT query which returns rows which this relation should contain.

params.name: data.pre_operations
params.description: SQL statements to be executed before creating the relation.

params.name: data.post_operations
params.description: SQL statements to be executed after creating the relation.

params.name: data.incremental_table_config
params.description: Configures INCREMENTAL_TABLE settings for this relation. Only set if relation_type is INCREMENTAL_TABLE.

params.name: data.partition_expression
params.description: The SQL expression used to partition the relation.

params.name: data.cluster_expressions
params.description: A list of columns or SQL expressions used to cluster the table.

params.name: data.partition_expiration_days
params.description: Sets the partition expiration in days.

params.name: data.require_partition_filter
params.description: Specifies whether queries on this table must include a predicate filter that filters on the partitioning column.

params.name: data.additional_options
params.description: Additional options that will be provided as key/value pairs into the options clause of a create table/view statement. See https://cloud.google.com/bigquery/docs/reference/standard-sql/data-definition-language for more information on which options are supported.
